Structure# AnnotationOverflowResolution

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 10.0+

```
struct AnnotationOverflowResolution
```

## [Topics](/documentation/Charts/AnnotationOverflowResolution#topics)

### [Structures](/documentation/Charts/AnnotationOverflowResolution#Structures)

[`struct Boundary`](/documentation/charts/annotationoverflowresolution/boundary)Describes a boundary of a chart for overflow resolution.[`struct Strategy`](/documentation/charts/annotationoverflowresolution/strategy)Strategies for annotation overflow resolution.### [Initializers](/documentation/Charts/AnnotationOverflowResolution#Initializers)

[`init(x: AnnotationOverflowResolution.Strategy, y: AnnotationOverflowResolution.Strategy)`](/documentation/charts/annotationoverflowresolution/init(x:y:))Creates an AnnotationOverflowResolution with strategies for the X and Y dimensions.### [Type Properties](/documentation/Charts/AnnotationOverflowResolution#Type-Properties)

[`static let automatic: AnnotationOverflowResolution`](/documentation/charts/annotationoverflowresolution/automatic)Automatically resolves overflow in each dimension.## [See Also](/documentation/Charts/AnnotationOverflowResolution#see-also)

### [Annotations](/documentation/Charts/AnnotationOverflowResolution#Annotations)

[`struct AnnotationContext`](/documentation/charts/annotationcontext)Information about an item that you add an annotation to.[`struct AnnotationPosition`](/documentation/charts/annotationposition)The position of an annotation.
